rule: If the chatbot is unable to process or determine the part of speech for the provided word, the output must not be "CantAnswer"; it must instead provide an explanation or reasoning in multi-line text.
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single tag, 'NNPS', which is present in the list of allowed part-of-speech tags provided in the description. The output doesn't contain any extra text or formatting that would violate the description.
OK
